code: import React from'react';import'../App.css';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import DeleteProduct from'./DeleteProduct';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var ProductList=function ProductList(props){var productList=props.productList,setProductList=props.setProductList;var token=localStorage.getItem('userInfo');var removeFromDom=function removeFromDom(productId){setProductList(productList.filter(function(product){return product._id!==productId;}));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{children:"All Products"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("table",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Title"}),token?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Edit"}):null,token?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{children:"Delete"}):null]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:productList.map(function(product,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/home/".concat(product._id),children:[' ',product.title,' ']})}),token?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:'/home/edit/'+product._id,children:"Edit"})}):null,token?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DeleteProduct,{productId:product._id,successCallback:function successCallback(){return removeFromDom(product._id);}})}):null]},index);})})]})]});};export default ProductList;
